title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Kyle's house, day. Stan and Kyle are happily preparing a snowman, which now has twigs, buttons, a hat and scarf. Tweek stands behind Stan holding a carrot.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Okay, now put on the nose, Tweek.

text: I can't.  You do it.

text: Just stick it on.

text: Tweek, when has that ever happened, except for that one time?

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Yeah.

text: Hey, fellas.

text: Well, Tweek's okay, but he's certainly no Kenny!

text: Arrrr!

text: Yeah.

text: Well ah, that's good. Good luck being their new friend, Tweek. I hope you'll do better than me. Well, see ya fellas.

text: You guys, you guys! You're not gonna believe it!

text: Uh oh.

text: Everything's gonna be okay, you guys! Life isn't so crappy after all!

text: It's not?

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: No! I was looking in this magazine, and I found an ad for little ocean creatures that you can buy and raise in your room!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: No way.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Look!  Sea people. You keep them under a big tank of water and they like, build castles and play basketball and stuff.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Nuh uh.

text: Yeah! And look! They ride around on turtles and they play games with fish.

text: Okay, Kyle, you're being a Negative Nancy. Stop it. Eh, unless you want everyone to call you Negative Nancy from now on.  Now, what we need is to all chip in four dollars, and we can have them here tonorrow!

text: Only sixteen dollars? They can't be cool if they're only sixteen dollars. If Nancy doesn't want to chip in, then it will be $5.35 per person!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Alright, I'll chip in.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Gah! Me too.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Naw, alright.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Butters' house, day. He reaches his room.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Butters! Don't forget: dinner is in two hours!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Wokay, mom. Ah I'm just gonna be up here, uh doin' my homework.  Yes. By day he is mild-mannered, sweet, and innocent Butters BUT...  nobody knows that he actually has a dark underside... Professor Chaos! Haha! Time to wreak havoc on the world that shunned me!

text: Professor Chaos!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT

text: Oh yes! I have plotted for weeks, and figured that if we build a huge ...wooden shade eighty feet high, a-and fifty feet wide , precisely on this hill, South Park ...will forever be cast in a great shadow.

text: Oh, awesome!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Soon, all people will have to live like moles! They will love only to remember with sorrow how great the sun used to be!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Cool. It'll be just like on the Simpsons.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Huh?

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: They did that on the Simpsons. I think it was the Mr. Burns character. He tried to block Springfield from the sun.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: He did? Hawww, heck. I thought I was bein' original.

text: So how do we build it?

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Aww, I don't wanna do it now , not if they already did it on the Simpsons. I have to think of something else. Uh Goddamnit, how come every time I think of something clever, the Simpsons already did it?

text: Do you have them or not?

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: We... sell semen, yes, but not normally to children.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: What's your name?

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Frances Velman

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Frances, let's talk. I don't want a bunch of bullcrap from you and you don't a bunch of bullcrap from me, right? Where does that get us? Nowhere. The truth is, I'm completely certified to handle sea men, and though I may appear young, I'm one of the leading sea men authorities of the Midwest. Up and comer, you know what I'm saying? I'll have my own business soon and I'll need people to run it. I'm talkin' about you, Frances. And I'm talkin' about a six-figure income. How does that sound?

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Everything we supply here is by a quarter-ounce. One donor, certified, on record.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: I see, very interesting.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: What are you doing?

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Takin' a look here.  Seems like quality stuff you got here, Frances. Yeah, good texture, nice consistency. Sea men must be alive and healthy in there. I'll take five.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Five? Vials?

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: No, gallons.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Www-we don't have that much here.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Damint! Give me all you've got, then!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: South Park, in town. Butters runs from Dougie, who chases after him

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Aaah! Ah, Ah, Aaah! Nooo! Nooo!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Simpsons did it!! Simpsons did it!!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Waaaah!  Hay! Uh let me on! Let me on!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: SIT DOWN AND SHUT UP!!!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Haaah!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Butters, have you seen Mr. Hat?

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Hello there, children!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Aaah! Nooo!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: ...What the hell's wrong with him?

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Cartman's room, later. Stan looks at the aquarium and sees the civilization has developed further. Pyramids now appear. The sound of running water is in the background. Cut to Kyle filling a larger tank with a water hose.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Look, the sea people have evolved to an Egyptian-like culture.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Soon they'll discover frozen food. Goh-ho.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: That should be enough water, Kyle. You got the new sea-people packets, Tweek?

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Uh-uh huh.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Well, drop them in!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: And I've got the sea men.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Wow. That's a lot of sea men you've got there, Cartman.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Yeah, I bought all that I could at this bank, and then I got the rest from this guy Ralph in an alley.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: That's cool.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Yeah, and the sweet thing is, this stupid asshole didn't even charge me money for it. He just made me close my eyes and suck it out of a hose. Heh.  There we go.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Okay, now let's put the sea ciety in its new home.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Nothin' to do now but wait.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: ...Close your eyes and suck it out of a hose?

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Uh-huh, suck it out of a hose, yeah.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Hm.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Huh.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Cartman's house, next day. He's asleep, but begins to stir. His eyes open and he grins at what he sees. He hops off the bed and rushes to the tank. He looks here and there and finds a more advanced civilization in the tank.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Oh my God! The tiny underwater civilization has advanced hundreds of years.  Look! There's a library! A-and a temple! And a- woh-?  Oh. They think I'm God.  Yes!!! I am god of the sea people!!! You hear that?!  I am god of the sea people!!! I am master of their great sunken empire!!! Mo-o-om! I'm god of the sea people!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: That's nice, poopie.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Butters' house, day. He's sitting in the living room, which now takes the appearance of the Simpson living room

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: And in other South Park News, elementay school teacher Ms. Choksondik's  autopsy has shown that the semen in her stomach belongs to school counselor, Mr. Mackey. However, the semen apparently did NOT contribute to the death, and so Mr. Mackey's identity is to remain anonymous.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Hey Butters.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Haaa!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Hey, what are you doing, man? Cartman says he has something really cool to show everybody. You've gotta come.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Cartman?

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Ha ha!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Cartman's house, whick now looks like a typical Springfield house, day. In Cartman's room, everyone but Butters is shown Simpsons-style. Present are Chef, Mr. Garrison, Liane, Tweek, Timmy, Stan, Kyle, Cartman, Dougie, and Butters. Cartman displays his new sea ciety

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Behold! You all see my tiny minions groveling at my likeness! I am Eric Cartman, god.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Hey. We paid for the sea people too. How come they're not making statues of us?

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Be you not jealous, Jew. I am creator of all things, yea.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: That is very impressive, Eric. What do you intend to do with your underwater society?

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: I'm gonna send a message to my people and tell 'em to develop a great machine that will shrink me down to their size, so I can live amongst them forever.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Aha! Ahaha! Ahahahaha!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: What the hell is wrong with you, Butters?

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: They did that on the Simpsons! Ha! Treehouse of Horror! Episode 4F02! The Genesis tub. Lisa loses a tooth, and the bacteria on it start to grow, and makes a little society, and they build a statue of her thinking she's God! Ha! Hahaha!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: ...Yeah. So?

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Dude, the Simpsons have done everything already. Who cares?

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Yeah, and they've been on the air for like, thirteen years. Of course they've done everything.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Every idea's been done, Butters, even before the Simpsons.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Yeah. In fact, that episode was a rip-off of a Twilight Zone episode.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Really? So I shouldn't care if I come up with an idea, and the Simpsons already did it. It... uh...doesn't... matter. Everything is back to normal, a, I think... I think I can go back to tryin' to destroy the world again.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Good for you!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Yeah, that's great Butters. Now get the hell out of my room.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: I feel like a spring chicken. I'm ready to wreak havoc once again!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Hey, look everybody! The other side of the aquarium is building another statue!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Hey! It's Tweek.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Me?? Aw, man! I don't wanna be a god. That is waaay too much pressure.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: That is bullcrap! You'd better stop worshiping him, sea people!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: What's going on now?

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: The sea people from Cartman's side are suicide-bombing the buildings on Tweek's side.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Gaaa-hah!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Yeah! Go!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: NOW what's happening?

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: The sea people on Tweek's side just suicide-bombed the Cartman statue.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Oh God-damnit!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Oh no! Oh the humanity!

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Well it was a nice project while it lasted, boys.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Yep. But I guess this proves that war is the natural order of life.

title: SIMPSONS ALREADY DID IT
text: Why can't societies just live in peace?
